transcript:
Customer: Hello

Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello, ha madam.
Customer: Ji sir, Richa baat kar rahi hu.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Abhi aap se baat hui na meri.
Executive: Ha ha ha.
Customer: Ha to sir dekhiye aap bol rahe the ki maine ek machine kharidi hai jiske liye wo jo jinse kharidi hai wo servicing ke liye call receive nahi kar rahe hain, hai na?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ji sir to main iske liye bata du ki jaise ki aapne unko call kiya aur wo call receive nahi kar rahe hain to iske liye aap unko dobara call kariye koi aur number hota hai to aap usse matlab unse baat kariye.
Customer: Mam pichle lagbhag ek dedh mahine se dikkat aa rahi hai wo call receive nahi kar rahe.
Customer: Aur nahi koi unka alternative number hai hamare paas mein jisse hum unse baat kar sake.
Executive: To sir dekhiye na wahi problem to fir hamare paas bhi aayegi na.
Customer: Wo jo bill pe number likha hua hai wo number se matlab wo number aur plus jo unke visiting card pe number tha dono same hi hai to usse call kar rahe hain receive nahi kar rahe.
Executive: Ha matlab keval servicing ka problem aa raha hai ki wo aapko servicing nahi de rahe hain baki aapko product pahuncha diya na aapke paas?
Customer: Product product to mere paas aa gaya hai but product ko leke service nahi ho rahi sir aapka service delivery nahi de pa rahe de rahe hain wo.
Executive: Service nahi de rahe hain to machine kya kya tha kaun sa machine tha apna aapka?
Customer: Mam sticker labeling machine tha.
Executive: Labeling machine.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Water bottle wala?
Customer: Ha water bottle ka.
Executive: Achcha to uske liye problem aa rahi hai.
Executive: To sir abhi main iske liye kya kar sakti hu iske liye na bas yahi ek option hai ki aap usko lagatar contact kariye agar hota hai to theek hai nahi to fir usme ab aap logo ke paas mein unke alternative number bhi rehte hain na.
Executive: Hamare paas ha but ek bar agar company ka naam pata hota to bata sakte hain hum unka company ka naam ya number bataiye.
Customer: Main number bata deta hu ye number hai.
Executive: Hmm. Main ek bar dekh leti hu search karke agar hai to.


Customer: 80
Executive: 80
Customer: 489
Executive: 489
Customer: 53319
Executive: 53319
Customer: Hai na sir?
Executive: Ji madam.
Executive: Ahmedabad ke hai kya?
Customer: Ji ha Ahmedabad.
Executive: Seven ji meeting. Ek minute.



Executive: Bas main isko check kiya tha line pe hi rahega theek hai main check kar leti hu. Ji. Inka detail to sara kuch mere paas aa gaya hai main ek bar inse connect karne ki koshish karungi agar dekhti hu kya response aata hai inki taraf se.
Executive: Ha. Machine ka price kitna tha sir aapka?
Customer: 180000.
Executive: 80000. Ha 180000.
Executive: Okay okay 180000.

Executive: Ha ye to matlab sahi hai client to bhi rahe hain sara kuch hai inka. Kuch pata nahi kyu aisa kar rahe hain.
Executive: Main dekhti hu ek bar ki kya baat kya matlab inko problem aa raha hai kyu nahi response kar rahe hain aur matlab directly inhi se baat hui thi aur kisi se baat hui thi.
Customer: Ji aur jab hum hum log gaye the to inhi se milke bhi aaye the.
Executive: Sorry kya sir?
Customer: Hum log Ahmedabad gaye bhi the machine ke liye to inse milke bhi aaye the.
Executive: Achcha milke bhi aaye the.
Customer: Ji ha.
Executive: Okay. Ji ji samajh rahi hu gaye the milke bhi aaye sara kuch hai fir bhi ye problem create hui hai.
Customer: Ji jaise inse baat hua abhi.
Executive: Hmm. Baat hone ke baad me hum logo ne time schedule set kiya ki hum is din aayenge aur jaisa bhi rahega machine ka demo vagaira waha dekh lenge aur use finalize out kar lenge.
Customer: Hmm. Ha to humne demo vagaira liya machine final kiya.
Customer: Ha then hum log leke aaye machine to leke aaye the installation ke liye bhi inhone banda 20-25 din baad bheja.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Vyakti. Wo bhi fir adhura chod ke gaya wo kam ko fir jaise bhi karke hum logo ne machine ko chalu kiya chalaya. Ab usme kaisa hai ki uske andar ka ek interior interior koi part jal gaya hai jisme se smell bhi aa rahi hai machine ke andar se jalne ki. To machine chal bhi nahi rahi hai. Ab wo one year ki warranty mein hai aur isko mere khyal se panch ek mahine hue hain char panch mahine. Ha. Ha ab wo pichle char panch dinon se call receive bhi nahi kar rahe hain. Nahi whatsapp pe koi reply kar rahe hain wo. Ha koi baat nahi main ek bar apni taraf se unse connect karti hu. Theek hai? Ji. Aur jaise mere ko agar response milta hai to main aapko aage forward karti hu theek hai sir? Theek. Aur koi agar problem ho to aap mere ko hi call kariyega. Okay. Theek hai. Okay thank you.
Customer: Ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Purchased machine not receiving servicing.

- Seller not responding to calls or messages.

- Machine interior part burnt, not running.



Resolution:

- Executive took the seller's number to check.

- Assured to connect with the seller.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will forward response after connecting with seller.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- machine, servicing, warranty, ahmedabad
